text: The elder [strongs id="g4245" /] unto the elect [strongs id="g1588" /] lady [strongs id="g2959" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] her [strongs id="g0846" /] children [strongs id="g5043" /], whom [strongs id="g3739" /] I [strongs id="g1473" /] love [strongs id="g0025" m="PresActInd" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] the truth [strongs id="g0225" /]; and [strongs id="g2532" /] not [strongs id="g3756" /] I [strongs id="g1473" /] only [strongs id="g3441" /], but [strongs id="g0235" /] also [strongs id="g2532" /] all [strongs id="g3956" /] they that have known [strongs id="g1097" m="PerfActPtc" /] the truth [strongs id="g0225" /];

For [strongs id="g1223" /] the truthâ€™s sake [strongs id="g0225" /], which [strongs id="g3588" /] dwelleth [strongs id="g3306" m="PresActPtc" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] us [strongs id="g2254" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] shall be [strongs id="g2071" m="FutInd" /] with [strongs id="g3326" /] us [strongs id="g2257" /] for [strongs id="g1519" /] ever [strongs id="g0165" /].

Grace [strongs id="g5485" /] be [strongs id="g2071" m="FutInd" /] with [strongs id="g3326" /] you [strongs id="g5216" /], mercy [strongs id="g1656" /], [and] peace [strongs id="g1515" /], from [strongs id="g3844" /] God [strongs id="g2316" /] the Father [strongs id="g3962" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] from [strongs id="g3844" /] the Lord [strongs id="g2962" /] Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /], the Son [strongs id="g5207" /] of the Father [strongs id="g3962" /], in [strongs id="g1722" /] truth [strongs id="g0225" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] love [strongs id="g0026" /].

I rejoiced [strongs id="g5463" m="Aor2PasDepInd" /] greatly [strongs id="g3029" /] that [strongs id="g3754" /] I found [strongs id="g2147" m="PerfActInd" /] of [strongs id="g1537" /] thy [strongs id="g4675" /] children [strongs id="g5043" /] walking [strongs id="g4043" m="PresActPtc" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] truth [strongs id="g0225" /], as [strongs id="g2531" /] we have received [strongs id="g2983" m="Aor2ActInd" /] a commandment [strongs id="g1785" /] from [strongs id="g3844" /] the Father [strongs id="g3962" /].

And [strongs id="g2532" /] now [strongs id="g3568" /] I beseech [strongs id="g2065" m="PresActInd" /] thee [strongs id="g4571" /], lady [strongs id="g2959" /], not [strongs id="g3756" /] as though [strongs id="g5613" /] I wrote [strongs id="g1125" m="PresActInd" /] [strongs id="g1125" m="PresActPtc" /] a new [strongs id="g2537" /] commandment [strongs id="g1785" /] unto thee [strongs id="g4671" /], but [strongs id="g0235" /] that which [strongs id="g3739" /] we had [strongs id="g2192" m="ImpfActInd" /] from [strongs id="g0575" /] the beginning [strongs id="g0746" /], that [strongs id="g2443" /] we love [strongs id="g0025" m="PresActSubj" /] one another [strongs id="g0240" /].

And [strongs id="g2532" /] this [strongs id="g3778" /] is [strongs id="g2076" m="PresInd" /] love [strongs id="g0026" /], that [strongs id="g2443" /] we walk [strongs id="g4043" m="PresActSubj" /] after [strongs id="g2596" /] his [strongs id="g0846" /] commandments [strongs id="g1785" /]. This [strongs id="g3778" /] is [strongs id="g2076" m="PresInd" /] the commandment [strongs id="g1785" /], That [strongs id="g2443" /], as [strongs id="g2531" /] ye have heard [strongs id="g0191" m="AorActInd" /] from [strongs id="g0575" /] the beginning [strongs id="g0746" /], ye should walk [strongs id="g4043" m="PresActSubj" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] it [strongs id="g0846" /].

For [strongs id="g3754" /] many [strongs id="g4183" /] deceivers [strongs id="g4108" /] are entered [strongs id="g1525" m="Aor2ActInd" /] into [strongs id="g1519" /] the world [strongs id="g2889" /], who [strongs id="g3588" /] confess [strongs id="g3670" m="PresActPtc" /] not [strongs id="g3361" /] that Jesus [strongs id="g2424" /] Christ [strongs id="g5547" /] is come [strongs id="g2064" m="PresMidPasDepPtc" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] the flesh [strongs id="g4561" /]. This [strongs id="g3778" /] is [strongs id="g2076" m="PresInd" /] a deceiver [strongs id="g4108" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] an antichrist [strongs id="g0500" /].

Look [strongs id="g0991" m="PresActImpr" /] to yourselves [strongs id="g1438" /], that we lose [strongs id="g0622" m="AorActSubj" /] not [strongs id="g3363" /] those things which [strongs id="g3739" /] we have wrought [strongs id="g2038" m="AorMidDepInd" /], but [strongs id="g0235" /] that we receive [strongs id="g0618" m="Aor2ActSubj" /] a full [strongs id="g4134" /] reward [strongs id="g3408" /].

Whosoever [strongs id="g3956" /] transgresseth [strongs id="g3845" m="PresActPtc" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] abideth [strongs id="g3306" m="PresActPtc" /] not [strongs id="g3361" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] the doctrine [strongs id="g1322" /] of Christ [strongs id="g5547" /], hath [strongs id="g2192" m="PresActInd" /] not [strongs id="g3756" /] God [strongs id="g2316" /]. He that abideth [strongs id="g3306" m="PresActPtc" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] the doctrine [strongs id="g1322" /] of Christ [strongs id="g5547" /], he [strongs id="g3778" /] hath [strongs id="g2192" m="PresActInd" /] both [strongs id="g2532" /] the Father [strongs id="g3962" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] the Son [strongs id="g5207" /].

If [strongs id="g1536" /] there come [strongs id="g2064" m="PresMidPasDepInd" /] any [strongs id="g1536" /] [strongs id="g5100" /] unto [strongs id="g4314" /] you [strongs id="g5209" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] bring [strongs id="g5342" m="PresActInd" /] not [strongs id="g3756" /] this [strongs id="g5026" /] doctrine [strongs id="g1322" /], receive [strongs id="g2983" m="PresActImpr" /] him [strongs id="g0846" /] not [strongs id="g3361" /] into [strongs id="g1519" /] [your] house [strongs id="g3614" /], neither [strongs id="g2532" /] [strongs id="g3361" /] bid [strongs id="g3004" m="PresActImpr" /] him [strongs id="g0846" /] God speed [strongs id="g5463" m="PresActInf" /]:

For [strongs id="g1063" /] he that biddeth [strongs id="g3004" m="PresActPtc" /] him [strongs id="g0846" /] God speed [strongs id="g5463" m="PresActInf" /] is partaker [strongs id="g2841" m="PresActInd" /] of his [strongs id="g0846" /] evil [strongs id="g4190" /] deeds [strongs id="g2041" /].

Having [strongs id="g2192" m="PresActPtc" /] many things [strongs id="g4183" /] to write [strongs id="g1125" m="PresActInf" /] unto you [strongs id="g5213" /], I would [strongs id="g1014" m="AorPasDepInd" /] not [strongs id="g3756" /] [write] with [strongs id="g1223" /] paper [strongs id="g5489" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] ink [strongs id="g3188" /]: but [strongs id="g0235" /] I trust [strongs id="g1679" m="PresActInd" /] to come [strongs id="g2064" m="Aor2ActInf" /] unto [strongs id="g4314" /] you [strongs id="g5209" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] speak [strongs id="g2980" m="AorActInf" /] face [strongs id="g4750" /] to [strongs id="g4314" /] face [strongs id="g4750" /], that [strongs id="g2443" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] joy [strongs id="g5479" /] may be [strongs id="g5600" m="PresSubj" /] full [strongs id="g4137" m="PerfPasPtc" /].

The children [strongs id="g5043" /] of thy [strongs id="g4675" /] elect [strongs id="g1588" /] sister [strongs id="g0079" /] greet [strongs id="g0782" m="PresMidPasDepInd" /] thee [strongs id="g4571" /]. Amen [strongs id="g0281" /].
